title: Tesla profit margins worst in five years as price cuts, incentives weigh
description: Tesla reported its lowest five-year profit margin, missing Wall Street earnings targets. CEO Musk announced 2025 models amid rising AI expenses and layoffs. Self-driving taxis and China-made EV sales dipped. Gross margin was 14.6%. Cybertruck production is progressing. Net income was $1.48 billion with $25.50 billion revenue. Shares fell 8%.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
